name: SKIP
description:
Do Not SKIP.


Do Take Note.

Find yourself trapped in a first person game. You don't know what you are doing or where you are going, but you will be determined to figure it out.

Again Do Not SKIP.


Everything is confusing and nothing makes sense, but you will figure it out.

You do not know how long you will be in here, but you cannot give up until you have solved every page and menu this game throws at you.

Make sure you explore, think, SKIP, learn.

You cannot SKIP.
